chainvalidation_js.account_name_should_not_be_empty: Account name should not be empty.
chainvalidation_js.badactor: Use caution sending to this account. Please double check your spelling for possible phishing.
chainvalidation_js.each_account_segment_should_be_longer: Each account segment should be longer.
chainvalidation_js.each_account_segment_should_end_with_a_l: Each account segment should end with a letter or digit.
chainvalidation_js.each_account_segment_should_have_only_le: Each account segment should have only lowercase letters, digits, or dashes.
chainvalidation_js.each_account_segment_should_have_only_on: Each account segment should have only one dash in a row.
chainvalidation_js.each_account_segment_should_start_with_a: Each account segment should start with a letter.
chainvalidation_js.memo_has_privatekey: Please do not include what appears to be a private key or password.
chainvalidation_js.memo_is_password: Do not use passwords in memos.
chainvalidation_js.memo_is_privatekey: Do not use private keys in memos.
chainvalidation_js.verified_exchange_no_memo: You must include a memo for your exchange transfer.
